casebody.data:
T.R.D., Appellant,
v.
D.G., III, Respondent. WD 81781 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: March 5, 2019 Mitzi J. Alspaugh and Geoffrey K. Aubrey, Kansas City, MO, Attorneys for Appellant. Samantha I. Sader, Kansas City, MO, Attorney for Respondent. Before Division Four: Karen King Mitchell, Chief Judge, and Mark D. Pfeiffer and Thomas N. Chapman, Judges

Order

Per Curiam:

T.R.D. (Mother) appeals a judgment modifying the custody arrangement of Z.R.D. (Child) by eliminating joint legal and physical custody between Mother and D.G. (Father) to grant Father sole legal and physical custody of Child and to allow Mother visitation rights of six hours per month in one of three identified public locations. Mother brings three points on appeal. As Mother has either waived or abandoned all of her claims on appeal, we affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
